name: Plank
tagline: A creative agency for meaningful digital projects.
description: Plank is an award-winning digital studio based in Montreal. Since 1998, we have committed ourselves to making the web a better place and providing personalized service to our clients. Our group of experienced and enthusiastic digital craftspeople are the heart of our agency. In fact, we’re more than a team, we’re a collective, and we thrive on working together to find the best solutions for your digital projects.
